attributes.action: Ban the parking of commercial vehicles and vans in residential areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This little island of ours is getting choked up with vehicles, one of the problems is commercial vehicles being parked in residential streets, these vehicles should be parked in the commercial center they have been registered with i.e the company that owns the vehicles yard or business address, these vans also encourage crime on our streets as the are a magnet for criminals wishing to break into them for the contents, usually when the company opens a depot in an area the company has to apply for permission to park commercial vehicles at the base, why then do we allow these vehicles in our residential streets when they have a base.
